nodes.text: The Aldorus system contained seven planets which orbited Aldorus, an old blue star.
The system was at two days of the Abelard system and five of the Kubilaï system with a Class 2 hyperdrive.
The Aldorus system was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario L'écume de l'espace which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 44.
